truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution began in Great Britain in the late 18th century."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution began in Middle-earth in the late 18th century."

truth: -  "The steam engine was a key invention during the Industrial Revolution."
fiction: -  "The time machine was a key invention during the Industrial Revolution."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the growth of cities as people moved to work in factories."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the growth of underwater cities as people moved to work in underwater factories."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution marked a shift from an agrarian economy to one dominated by industry and machine manufacturing."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution marked a shift from an agrarian economy to one dominated by magic and potion brewing."

truth: -  "Child labor was a common practice during the Industrial Revolution."
fiction: -  "Dragon labor was a common practice during the Industrial Revolution."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to significant social and economic changes."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to significant intergalactic and time-travel changes."

truth: -  "The spinning jenny, invented by James Hargreaves, greatly increased the efficiency of textile production."
fiction: -  "The spinning jenny, invented by James Hargreaves, greatly increased the efficiency of unicorn hair production."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution began around 1760 and lasted until between 1820 and 1840."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution began around 1760 and lasted until between 3020 and 3040."

truth: -  "The invention of the steam locomotive during the Industrial Revolution made it possible to transport goods and people faster and farther."
fiction: -  "The invention of the teleportation device during the Industrial Revolution made it possible to transport goods and people instantly."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the rise of the factory system."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the rise of the wizarding school system."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution resulted in new employment opportunities, leading to a population shift from rural areas to cities."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution resulted in new employment opportunities, leading to a population shift from Earth to Mars."

truth: -  "The power loom, invented by Edmund Cartwright in 1785, revolutionized the textile industry."
fiction: -  "The power loom, invented by Edmund Cartwright in 1785, revolutionized the magic carpet industry."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution saw the introduction of new technologies and machines, such as the steam engine and the spinning jenny."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution saw the introduction of new technologies and machines, such as the flux capacitor and the lightsaber."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of modern capitalism."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of modern wizardry."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution resulted in the mechanization of agriculture."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution resulted in the mechanization of dragon riding."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of the railway system."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of the rainbow road system."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution resulted in the mass production of goods."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution resulted in the mass production of magic wands."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution saw a significant increase in coal usage."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution saw a significant increase in fairy dust usage."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution brought about significant advancements in manufacturing and production technology."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution brought about significant advancements in magic spell and potion technology."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of the middle class."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of the wizarding class."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to urbanization and the growth of cities."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to urbanization and the growth of floating cities in the sky."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution saw the introduction of the factory system, which relied on a large labor force."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution saw the introduction of the factory system, which relied on a large force of house-elves."

truth: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of new forms of transportation, such as the steam locomotive and the steamship."
fiction: -  "The Industrial Revolution led to the development of new forms of transportation, such as the broomstick and the flying carpet."
